name: Register validation with invalid inputs/ similar fields

steps.name: Given  user opens browser and launch the url "https://dsportalapp.herokuapp.com/"
When  user clicks on "Get started" button
Then  user should successfully able to see register page title "Registration"
When  user enters the "valli@1234" "valli@1234" "valli@1234" all similar to one another
Then  user should get password not similar to username error message "password can not be similar as username"

statusDetails.message: expected [password can not be similar as username] but found [password_mismatch:The two password fields didn’t match.]
